Class SocketClient

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.galaxytrucker.Network.Client.SocketClient
public class SocketClient extends Object
SocketClient is the client-side implementation that connects to the server using sockets. It handles user input and game updates, and can operate in both TUI and GUI modes.

  • Constructor Details

    • SocketClient

      protected SocketClient(ObjectInputStream objIn, ObjectOutputStream objOut, int choice) throws UnknownHostException, IOException
      Constructor for SocketClient. Initializes the client with the given ObjectInputStream and ObjectOutputStream. If the choice is 2, it sends a message to the server to start a game and waits for a response.
      Parameters:
      objIn - ObjectInputStream for reading messages from the server
      objOut - ObjectOutputStream for sending messages to the server
      choice - UI choice (1 for TUI, 2 for GUI)
      Throws:
      UnknownHostException - if the host is unknown
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs

  • Method Details

    • setGUI

      public void setGUI(GUI gui)
      Sets the GUI instance for the client. This method is used to update the GUI reference when it is created.
      Parameters:
      gui - the GUI instance to set

    • run

      public void run() throws RemoteException
      Runs the client, starting the virtual server and the command line interface. It listens for messages from the server and processes them accordingly.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is an error in remote communication

    • runVirtualServer

      public void runVirtualServer() throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException
      Runs the virtual server, continuously reading messages from the server. It processes each message by invoking the referMethod method.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs
      ClassNotFoundException - if a class cannot be found during deserialization

    • referMethod

      public void referMethod(it.polimi.ingsw.galaxytrucker.Network.Message msg) throws RemoteException
      Processes the received message and calls the appropriate method based on its content. It handles both string messages and game-related messages.
      Parameters:
      msg - the message received from the server
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is an error in remote communication

    • viewCard

      public void viewCard(it.polimi.ingsw.galaxytrucker.Model.GamePackage.Game game) throws RemoteException
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • viewShips

      public void viewShips(it.polimi.ingsw.galaxytrucker.Model.GamePackage.Game game) throws RemoteException
      Displays the ships in the game. This method is used to print the ships in the game to the console.
      Parameters:
      game - the game for which to view the ships
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is an error in remote communication

    • viewTile

      public void viewTile(it.polimi.ingsw.galaxytrucker.Model.Tiles.Tile currentTile) throws RemoteException
      Displays the current tile in the game. This method is used to print the current tile to the console.
      Parameters:
      currentTile - the tile to view
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is an error in remote communication

    • viewTilePile

      public void viewTilePile(it.polimi.ingsw.galaxytrucker.Model.GamePackage.Game game) throws RemoteException
      Connects the view to the game. This method is called when the client connects to the server and needs to view the game state.
      Parameters:
      game - the game to connect to
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is an error in remote communication

    • defaultView

      public void defaultView(it.polimi.ingsw.galaxytrucker.Model.GamePackage.Game game, String nickname) throws RemoteException
      Displays the default view of the game. This method updates the game state and prints the tile pile and the player's ship.
      Parameters:
      game - the game to view
      nickname - the nickname of the player
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is an error in remote communication

    • viewLeaderboard

      public void viewLeaderboard(it.polimi.ingsw.galaxytrucker.Model.GamePackage.Game game, String nickname) throws RemoteException
      Displays the leaderboard of the game. This method prints the leaderboard to the console.
      Parameters:
      game - the game for which to view the leaderboard
      nickname - the nickname of the player
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is an error in remote communication

    • viewMyShip

      public void viewMyShip(it.polimi.ingsw.galaxytrucker.Model.GamePackage.Game game, String nickname) throws RemoteException
      Displays the player's ship. This method prints the player's ship to the console.
      Parameters:
      game - the game for which to view the player's ship
      nickname - the nickname of the player
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is an error in remote communication

    • helpMessage

      public void helpMessage()
      Prints a help message to the console. This method is used to display a guide or help message to the user.

    • setNickname

      public void setNickname(it.polimi.ingsw.galaxytrucker.Network.Message msg) throws RemoteException
      Sets the nickname for the player. This method is called when the server sends a message to set the player's nickname.
      Parameters:
      msg - the message containing the nickname
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is an error in remote communication

    • pongNickname

      public void pongNickname()
      Sends a PONG message with the player's nickname to the server. This method is called to confirm that the client is still connected and active.

    • getServerSocket

      public VirtualServerSocket getServerSocket() throws IOException
      Returns the server socket associated with this client. This method is used to retrieve the server socket for further communication.
      Returns:
      the VirtualServerSocket instance
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException, UnknownHostException
      Throws:
      IOException
      UnknownHostException
